name: Auto Robot Fighting 3D
description:
Auto Robot Fighting 3D will give you the 3D robot fight experience. In this stunning robo game, you’ll test your controlling skills of both mega bots and bot car. This is a new kind of robot war games where you will feel like in future because of this new robot fighting games
Features:
• Different Robotic Vehicles to Choose.
• Real 3D Graphics and environment.
• Smooth on screen controls
• Amazing, Thrilling and Stunning gameplay levels
• Brilliant Sounds
• Change Car into Robot and Robot into Car
